_aChangeLog.text: scroll routes adjusted in many places
fixed main corridor area jump back
impossible jumps in many places fixed

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Welcome to bhop_aimer_v3 many changes here from v2 that were adjusted and fixed including the roof rafter skip for scroll made possible.
This update was made to make the map not only possible but fun for legit bhop style.

_aChangeLog.text: starting route has new wood planks for a relaxed start
roof skip and roof structure changed in 2nd town
middle shaft now has 3 possible ways
double surf leads into a much more easy skip
floating cubes raised to avoid head-hit
2nd town surf skip entrance widened to allow more speed
raised billboard so roof slant catches the feet at the end of wood plank

_aLatestUpdates._sText: a LOT of quality of life fixes for speed runners and in addition scroll gets a new route in the city.

_sText:
Hello everyone!

4 YEARS AGO...

bhop_aimer started when I wanted to make the longest linear map but also keep it open to new routes

THE WHOLE MAP IS 1 SHOT
NO CHECKPOINTS

I hope you all like it!
